meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Throat</kanji> <kanji>candy</kanji> is the kind of candy that should make your throat feel better. That's right, it's a <vocabulary>cough drop</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>throat lozenge</vocabulary>. Don't just eat regular candy when your throat hurts! Use the right kind.
readingMnemonic: This word uses the kun'yomi readings for both kanji. You've learned them both already, so you should be able to read this already!
